items.title: Tldr database is older than 2 weeks
items.subtitle: Please Enter!

items.title: Lists open files and the corresponding processes.
items.subtitle: Note: Root privileges (or sudo) is required to list files opened by others.

items.title: lsof {path/to/file}
items.subtitle: Find the processes that have a given file open:

items.title: lsof -i :{port}
items.subtitle: Find the process that opened a local internet port:

items.title: lsof -u {username}
items.subtitle: List files opened by the given user:

items.title: lsof -c {process_or_command_name}
items.subtitle: List files opened by the given command or process:

items.title: lsof -p {PID}
items.subtitle: List files opened by a specific process, given its PID:

items.title: lsof +D {path/to/directory}
items.subtitle: List open files in a directory:

items.title: lsof -i6TCP:{port} -sTCP:LISTEN -n -P
items.subtitle: Find the process that is listening on a local IPv6 TCP port and don't convert network or port numbers:
